actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research, Gen. Leg.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Research and General Legislation

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to establish and carry out programs to eradicate the disease of scrapie in the sheep and goat populations of the United States and to conduct research regarding scrapie, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Scrapie Eradication Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish scrapie (sheep and goat disease) research and eradication programs, including owner indemnification for any animals destroyed under such programs. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to establish and carry out programs to eradicate the disease of scrapie in the sheep and goat populations of the United States and to conduct research regarding scrapie, and for other purposes.
